QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: Altitude
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: Altitude for the bottom layer of the structure scan.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: CorridorWidth
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: Corridor width. Specify 0 width for a single pass scan.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: Trigger distance
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: Distance between each triggering of the camera. 0 specifies not camera trigger.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: GridSpacing
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: Amount of spacing in between parallel grid lines.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: TurnaroundDistance
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: Amount of additional distance to add outside the survey area for vehicle turnaround.
